Name: Sherlock Holmes and The Hound of The Baskervilles
About the game: Help Sherlock Holmes, the famed detective, investigate the legend of a supernatural hound on the fog-shrouded moorland in England of the 19th century. Immerse yourself into the dangerous world of diabolical curse and discover the truth of the monstrous creature. Key features: Unusual representation of Sir Arthur Conan Doyleâ€™s most read book Incredible gameplay combining hidden object and puzzle game Over 35 locations to explore Choose your level of difficulty: additional or limited help and hints, quick or slow hint recharge, easy or hard puzzles and Hidden Objects
